name: py-pynucleus

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PyNucleus is a finite element code that specifically targets nonlocal
operators.

dependencies.name: metis
dependencies.description:
METIS is a set of serial programs for partitioning graphs, partitioning
finite element meshes, and producing fill reducing orderings for sparse
matrices. The algorithms implemented in METIS are based on the
multilevel recursive-bisection, multilevel k-way, and multi-constraint
partitioning schemes.

dependencies.name: parmetis
dependencies.description:
ParMETIS is an MPI-based parallel library that implements a variety of
algorithms for partitioning unstructured graphs, meshes, and for
computing fill-reducing orderings of sparse matrices.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-meshpy
dependencies.description: Simplicial Mesh Generation from Python

dependencies.name: py-modepy
dependencies.description: Basis Functions and Node Sets for Interpolation

dependencies.name: py-mpi4py
dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-html
dependencies.description:
pytest-html is a plugin for pytest that generates a HTML report for test
results

dependencies.name: py-pytools
dependencies.description: A collection of tools for Python

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-sparse
dependencies.description:
Sparse matrix tools extending scipy.sparse, but with incompatible
licenses

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependencies.name: suite-sparse
dependencies.description: SuiteSparse is a suite of sparse matrix algorithms
